Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds li=
ke a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your=
 alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepp=
ed forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stoma=
ch. "I'll go first."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight.=
 That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In o=
ther words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me takin=
g the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. =
You know, you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

 =
 Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
    ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent:=
 Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
    Subject: Sorry soulstice


    S=
orry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

    claw struck=
 him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by=
 the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he =
again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judg=
ing by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large,=
 Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw=


    Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like=
 hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be=
 knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at =
the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best =
shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
    Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
      Subject: Re: three on on=
e hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


      OOC: Hey, Gig=
as punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: =
Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
        Subject: three on one hardly se=
ems fair, maybe the three should get help.


        Razor Claw saw the thr=
ee bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping allia=
nce members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. =
He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transfo=
rmed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or=
 you will be forced to, your choice."

        He aproached the three bots =
ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dachande 
          To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
        =
  Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


          ::Eclipse/Wolveritro=
n/Ramus::
           
              They had heard the battling and decided=
 to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron =
ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in b=
east modes. And headed far away.







        eGroups Sponsor
